channel.title: Labs on Orange Academy
channel.description: Recent content in Labs on Orange Academy

item.title: Hello JavaScript Lab
item.description: Step 1: Setup Create a directory for your labs for this course: cd $HOME mkdir js-foundations cd js-foundations mkdir labs cd labs Step 2: Create a JavaScript file and add some code touch hello.

item.title: Expressions Lab
item.description: Let’s code a Temperature Converter. Step 1: Create the JavaScript file and Add the Starter Code cd $HOME/js-foundations/labs touch expressions.

item.title: Functions Lab
item.description: Step 1: Create the JavaScript file cd $HOME/js-foundations/labs touch functions.js Step 2: Implement the fizzBuzz function Write a function named fizzBuzz that takes a single argument The argument should be a number/integer Write a condition that determines if the argument is evenly divisible If the argument is evenly divisible by 3 and 5 return the string “FizzBuzz” If the number can be evenly divisible by 3 return the string “Fizz” If the number is evenly divisible by 5 return the string “Buzz” If none of these conditions apply, return the number Step 3: Test your solution Add a statement that calls your fizzBuzz function with a value, such as 3 and prints the result to the console.
